longMarketingProductName: X94D | LED | 4K Ultra HD | High Dynamic Range (HDR) | Smart TV (Android TV™)
longDescription: Thanks to our ingenious Slim Backlight Drive™, this 4K HDR television offers breathtaking picture quality in a super thin design.

topFeatures: Slim Backlight Drive for beautiful design and picture quality
Incredible contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO
ecoFeatures: Dynamic Backlight Control helps improve energy efficiency by adjusting backlight brightness as picture content changes.
Power Saving Mode helps save energy by adjusting backlight brightness.
Back Light Off Mode helps save energy by turning picture off which is realized by both display off on LCD panel and back-light off.

featureBenefits.headline: 4K HDR : the next generation of picture quality
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: A High Dynamic Range (HDR)-compatible TV will change the way you look at TV. Combined with 4K Ultra HD resolution, HDR video content delivers exceptional detail, colour and contrast, with a far wider range of brightness than other video formats. The result is the most lifelike picture that TV has ever been able to create, with brilliant highlights and fine detail.

featureBenefits.headline: 4K Processor X1™: one chip changes everything
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Our powerful 4K Processor X1™ brings stunning picture quality to whatever you're watching. Every source is intelligently analysed and enhanced to near 4K resolution, from TV broadcasts, Blu-ray Discs, DVDs, or even 4K internet videos. You'll enjoy incredible 4K images with stunning clarity, more lifelike colours and sparkling contrast.

featureBenefits.headline: Slim Backlight Drive™ - Achieving picture and design
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Our unique Slim Backlight Drive delivers astounding image quality from an incredibly slim design.

featureBenefits.headline: This TV is recommended by Netflix
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Get a better streaming experience with a Netflix Recommended TV. A Netflix Recommended TV is chosen for its high performance, cutting-edge smart features and easy app access. You can also watch Marco Polo in 4K HDR today, with a premium Netflix subscription. Members will be able to enjoy more HDR content in the coming months.

featureBenefits.headline: TRILUMINOS™ display
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Unique to Sony, a TRILUMINOS™ Display enriches your viewing experience with a wider palette of colours and more natural shades and hues. A TRILUMINOS Display excels at reproducing reds, greens and blues — colours that are notoriously difficult for TVs to display accurately. It also displays skin tones beautifully, thanks to its extensive colour palette and precise gradation.

featureBenefits.headline: 4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Discover a thrilling world of extraordinary clarity. Every single pixel is enhanced beautifully by our most powerful 4K picture processing technology ever. Individual parts of each scene are analysed and matched with a special image database that independently addresses texture, contrast, colour and edges. The difference is clear with supremely lifelike detail, whatever you're watching.

featureBenefits.headline: X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO: backlight brilliance
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: This unique backlighting algorithm faithfully reproduces a far wider brightness range than a conventional LED TV with brighter peaks and deeper, more revealing shadow detail and blacks. When combined with an HDR signal, you’ll experience even greater brilliance in every scene as it increases the quality of HDR with finely-gradated bands of colour and more vibrant colours.

featureBenefits.headline: Immerse yourself in 3D
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enjoy compatible Blu-ray movies, TV broadcasts and web videos with finely detailed 3D images. See pictures with a more natural depth of field and immerse yourself in sport, movies and games like never before.

featureBenefits.headline: Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow™ XR. This innovative technology creates and inserts extra frames between the original ones. It compares key visual factors on successive frames, then calculates the split second of missing action in the sequences. Some models also include black-frame insertion for a blur-free and truly cinematic look.

featureBenefits.headline: Hangs like a picture
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Hang your TV flat to the wall like a piece of fine art, thanks to a flush wall mount. A unique cooling system pulls air vertically through the TV for reliable operation .

featureBenefits.headline: Super slim flush surface display
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The screen on this ultra-thin 4K HDR TV has a flush finish with no raised bezel for a near-invisible edge.

featureBenefits.headline: Clean rear look
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Keep wires out of sight, thanks to a hidden cable panel structure. All of your cables are fully concealed behind the panel, and run down through the centre of the stand, so everything looks tidy.

featureBenefits.headline: Chromecast built-in: Plays nice with your other devices
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: BRAVIA™ is Chromecast built-in-ready so you can easily cast your favourite entertainment like YouTube™ from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA™ screen. You can cast from Android, iOS or your laptop.

featureBenefits.headline: Say what you want to see with voice search
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Spend less time browsing, and more time watching. Voice search on Android TV™ provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry. You can also get recommendations; asking for “romantic comedies” for example, brings up a list of suitable options.

featureBenefits.headline: BRAVIA meets Android TV
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Your smart TV just got smarter. Think of all the stuff you love doing on your smartphone or tablet, now on the big, beautiful BRAVIA® screen. All-new Sony Android TV lets you connect and enjoy any content, from apps to movies, between different Android devices – the simplest and easiest way ever.

featureBenefits.headline: Google Play™: A world of content and apps
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Discover movies and TV shows, games and much more from Google Play™. Enjoy a huge and ever-growing choice of apps  on your TV in a brand new way.

featureBenefits.headline: Made to listen: ClearAudio+
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Make your listening as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine-tunes TV sound for an immersive experience that seems to surround you. Hear music, dialogue and surround effects with greater clarity and separation, whatever you're watching.

featureBenefits.headline: Cinematic S-Force Front Surround
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Enjoy an immersive soundstage that pulls you into the heart of the action. S-Force Front Surround mimics the way the brain correlates sound sources to create proper volume, time lag and sound wave spectrum — using only left and right speaker channels. By naturally emulating three-dimensional sound fields, you'll enjoy rich, high-fidelity audio across a wider listening area.

featureBenefits.headline: DSEE restores detail to your digital music
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Low-resolution Internet video, catch-up TV and other heavily compressed audio files don't always sound so great. A large amount of information gets thrown away when digital audio is compressed. With Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) technology, lost frequency components (especially high frequencies) are restored for natural sound with a more spacious feel.

featureBenefits.headline: Clear Phase for smooth, balanced frequencies
featureBenefits.bodyCopy:
Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity.
An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.

featureBenefits.headline: X-Protection PRO: Xtra Protection TV
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Your TV is strong now. Advanced protection shields your TV against electrical surges, while a primary capacitor protects against unstable electricity. An anti-humidity coating on the circuit board prevents short-circuits caused by high moisture.

featureBenefits.headline: Content Bar: find everything fast
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The unobtrusive Content Bar quickly lets you find the movie, TV show or video you’re looking for. Call up the Content Bar and you can keep watching while you scan through live TV, videos on demand, downloaded TV shows and much more. You can even customise the content bar to show you the content you go to most often first.

featureBenefits.headline: Notify BRAVIA®: Don’t miss a thing
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Don’t miss a thing while you’re absorbed in your favourite show. Download the Notify BRAVIA® app from Google Play™ to your smartphone, and when it’s connected to the same network your TV will keep you in the loop with call notifications, text messages, social apps and more.

featureBenefits.headline: Serial AbTak: never miss a show
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: Watch your favourite TV shows anytime from a wide variety of regional and national channels, with our exclusive catch-up TV app. Intuitive navigation lets you easily create personalised playlists, assign favourites and organise shows by channel, episode or language.

featureBenefits.headline: IR Blaster – control everything with one remote
featureBenefits.bodyCopy: The Infra-red (IR) Blaster lets you control other devices in your home from your Sony TV remote. You can use it to control your Set-top box (cable box) with the TV remote controller.

factualShortDescription: 4K Ultra HD TV with 4K Processor X1, X-tended Dynamic Range PRO, 4K- X-Reality PRO and TRILUMINOS.
elevatorPitch: Experience breathtaking 4K entertainment in a super thin design.

expertReviews.title: Stuff
expertReviews.quote: The Sony KD-55X9300D is a superb TV. It looks great, and it performs, if anything, even better.

expertReviews.title: Livemint
expertReviews.quote: You should buy the Bravia X93D because it is a solid package in terms of picture quality.

topFeatures: Slim Backlight Drive for beautiful design and picture quality
Incredible contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO

Incredible contrast with X-tended Dynamic Range PRO
floatingFootnotes: Slim Backlight Drive™ is available on X93D only. X94D series feature Full Array LED backlight.
